title: Health and healing for body and mind - 25 July 2016
author: BreaCan Follow BreaCan
description: Health and healing for body and mind - 25 July 2016 - Download as a PDF or view online for free
cleaned_text: is a GP, teacher and a leader in the field of mind-body medicine. He presents on the importance of lifestyle, mindfulness and integrating mind and body in the management of a cancer diagnosis and treatment. 25 July 2016 at BreaCan in Melbourne, Australia.
